title: Fact Vs Fiction: Spotting Aliens In Vizag, Was Tom Moody Trolled?
subtitle: Were Aliens Spotted In Vizag? Was Tom Moody Trolled By Communist Supporters From Kerala On Facebook? The Bullet Train Project: Was An MOU Signed Between India And Japan? Watch episode-9 Of Fact Vs...
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Were Aliens Spotted In Vizag? Was Tom Moody Trolled By Communist Supporters From Kerala On Facebook? The Bullet Train Project: Was An MOU Signed Between India And Japan?

Watch episode-9 Of Fact Vs Fiction where Suyash Barve & Jency Jacob discuss the fake news stories in the last one week and how you can spot them on social media.

In this Video we cover the following stories:

Was Tom Moody Trolled By Communist Supporters From Kerala On Facebook? A FactCheck

Was An MOU Signed Between India And Japan For The Bullet Train Project? A FactCheck

Aliens Or Barn Owls In Vizag? The Real Story Behind The Viral Video

‘Nehru Kissed By A Lady?’: The Video BJP IT Cell Head Amit Malviya Should See
